skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...
skill.author: unknown

security_audit.summary: Official skill from the Anthropic repository. Minimal audit performed per policy. No security issues observed in scanned text files.

content.user_title: Apply professional themes to your artifacts
content.value_statement: Choosing consistent styling across artifacts is time consuming. This skill provides curated themes and applies them quickly.
actual_capabilities: Display the theme showcase PDF for visual selection
List 10 preset themes with palettes and font pairings
Read theme files to retrieve hex colors and font names
Apply a selected theme to slides or documents
Generate a custom theme from user inputs
limitations: Does not edit or modify the theme showcase PDF
Requires explicit user selection before applying a theme
Only includes the 10 preset themes unless you request a custom theme
Does not verify font availability in the target tool

use_cases.title: Standardize pitch decks
use_cases.description: Apply a consistent theme to quarterly roadmap decks without manual styling.

use_cases.title: Explore brand directions
use_cases.description: Compare curated palettes and typography options before creating a custom theme.

use_cases.title: Polish client reports
use_cases.description: Select a professional theme to improve readability and visual consistency.

prompt_templates.title: Show available themes
prompt_templates.scenario: You need to pick a theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Show the theme showcase and list the available themes. Ask me which theme to apply.

prompt_templates.title: Apply a preset theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the Ocean Depths theme to my slide deck. Use the listed colors and fonts consistently.

prompt_templates.title: Create a custom theme
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a new theme for a wellness brand using calm greens and warm neutrals. Name it and show the palette and fonts.

prompt_templates.title: Advanced multi artifact
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the Modern Minimalist theme for my slides, report, and landing page. Ensure contrast and consistent typography.

output_examples.input: Apply the Arctic Frost theme to my presentation
output: Palette: Ice Blue, Steel Blue, Silver, Crisp White
Typography: DejaVu Sans Bold for headers, DejaVu Sans for body
Applied consistent colors and fonts across all slides

best_practices: Confirm the theme choice before applying changes
Use the theme showcase to help stakeholders decide
Check contrast and readability after applying a theme
anti_patterns: Applying a theme without explicit user confirmation
Mixing multiple themes in one artifact
Changing palette values outside the theme specification

faq.question: Is this compatible with my slide tool
faq.answer: It provides colors and fonts. You apply them in your tool of choice.

faq.question: Are there limits on themes
faq.answer: There are 10 preset themes. You can also request a custom theme.

faq.question: Can it integrate with existing design systems
faq.answer: Yes, you can map the provided palette and fonts to your system.

faq.question: Does it handle my data safely
faq.answer: It only uses the theme files and your instructions to style artifacts.

faq.question: What if the theme does not look right
faq.answer: Request another preset or ask for a custom theme with specific changes.

faq.question: How is it different from generic styling
faq.answer: It offers curated palettes and font pairings with clear usage guidance.
